about_the_game:
MꚚRN is an old school FPS inspired by the classics. Tear your way through environments filled with unholy creatures using an arsenal of weapons and power-ups, find secret areas and never stop moving.

Levels in MꚚRN are built using 'blocks', giving the game a distinct style and more importantly, allowing you to easily create, share and play new levels whenever you want, utilising the same tools used to create the game's core campaign. This gives MꚚRN a unique level of creative accessibility and freedom.

Key features


Old school, classic single-player FPS gameplay
Action-packed, nonstop, fast-paced gameplay inspired by the FPS classics such as Doom and Quake.


Find secrets hidden throughout the levels
Explore levels full of hidden secrets waiting to be found!


Build and share your unique levels inside the game
Full-level editor to allow you to easily create, share and play custom community-created content.


Easily customise and share world textures
Create, upload and download texture packs to change the look of the game and your levels.

name: MORN Demo
short_description: As a minister of the church and a founding member of the prestigious and secretive Helsing Society, it is your job to banish the world of the unholy. Rage war against maleficent entities such as; vampires, werewolves, demons and their worshipers to cleanse Gods kingdom of the evil festering within.
